title: Refine Your Idea
description: Now it's time to refine your original idea based on all the insights you've gathered. Your refined offer should directly address the core problem for your focused target market.

placeholders.refinedIdeaPlaceholder: e.g., A 6-week group program that helps agency owners implement systems and automation to reduce their direct client work by 50% while maintaining or increasing revenue

tooltips.refinedIdeaTooltip: Describe your refined offer, including what it is, who it's for, and the specific problem it solves

examples: A done-for-you client onboarding system that helps service providers create a professional first impression and reduce admin time by 80%
A 30-day course that teaches e-commerce store owners how to optimize their product pages to increase conversion rates by at least 15%
A monthly membership that provides freelance designers with templates, scripts, and community support to help them find better clients and increase their rates
A software tool that helps course creators track student progress and automatically provide support when students get stuck, increasing completion rates by 40%
